translated: In Tibetan: Byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po’i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba🔽Homage to glorious Vajrayoginī.🔽Homage to the glorious lord of compassion,

analyzed: dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag po mchog_/spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/

analyzed: nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs bri/_/dang po dang ba rab brtan nas/_/byang

analyzed: chub mchog tu sems skyed de/_/rang nyid he ru kar skyed la/_/de rjes stong

analyzed: pa nyid du bsgom/_/bla ma sangs rgyas can kun mchod/_/bstod dang bshags

analyzed: pa la sogs bya/_/bsngo zhing tshhad med bzhi po bsgom/_/de rjes stong pa nyid du
translated: After that, think of emptiness.🔽  From within emptiness, think of a,

analyzed: bsam/_/stong pa'i ngang las e bsam te/_/de rjes hum las rdo rje'i brag_/
translated: and then from a hum, a vajra rock,🔽variegated in color, and from ram, a sun mandala.

translated: Upon that, from a gha,🔽a black hum,🔽which becomes a black, wrathful body with three faces and six arms.

original: 'jig par byed/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rngam pa'i sku/_/g.yas dkar g.yon
analyzed: 'jig par byed/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rngam pa'i sku/_/g.yas dkar g.yon

original: pa dmar bas te/_/dbus mthing stag gi pags pas bsgril/_/rin chen🔽zhabs gdub sbrul gyis brgyan/_/phyag g.yas gri gug phreng ba dang /_/da ma ru

translated: He is adorned with jewel🔽anklets and snakes, and his right hands hold a flaying knife, a rosary,🔽and a damaru drum that he beats fiercely.🔽  His left hands hold a skull cup, a spear,

original: ni drag tu 'khrol/_/g.yon pa thod pa mdung rtshe gsum/_/de bzhin zhags pas
analyzed: ni drag tu 'khrol/_/g.yon pa thod pa mdung rtshe gsum/_/de bzhin zhags pas

analyzed: dgra bo 'dzin/_/drag po'i zhal las mche ba gtshig_/spyan gsum dbu skra gyen
translated: He holds his enemy, bares his fangs from his wrathful mouth, has three eyes, and his hair blazes upward.

original: du 'bar/_/pral _ba sin+d+hu ra yi g.yu rung 'khyil/_/mi skyod spyi bor bzhugs
analyzed: du 'bar/_/pral _ba sin+d+hu ra yi g.yu rung 'khyil/_/mi skyod spyi bor bzhugs

original: pas byin gyis brlobs/_/gnas gsum lha bsam ye shes sems dpa' bstim/_/
analyzed: pas byin gyis brlobs/_/gnas gsum lha bsam ye shes sems dpa' bstim/_/
translated: The deities of the three places dissolve into the gnosis beings.

original: dbang bskur nas ni ri bdag so sor bsam/_/brtan par gyur nas rang gi
analyzed: dbang bskur nas ni ri bdag so sor bsam/_/brtan par gyur nas rang gi
translated: After the empowerment, imagine them individually.🔽When they are stable, in front of them is the glorious Krodhī Jālinī,

original: mdun/_/dpal ldan khro mo dza li ni/_/g.yas pa gri gug thod khrag g.yon/_/
analyzed: mdun/_/dpal ldan khro mo dza li ni/_/g.yas pa gri gug thod khrag g.yon/_/
translated: with a flaying knife and skull cup full of blood in her two hands.🔽She is black and terrifying.

analyzed: sku mdog nag mo 'jigs byed ma/_/g.yas su k+she tra pa li ma/_/da ma ru g.yas

original: sdig 'dzub g.yon/_/sku mdog du ba'i mdog can no/_/g.yon du ta ki ra tsha
analyzed: sdig 'dzub g.yon/_/sku mdog du ba'i mdog can no/_/g.yon du ta ki ra tsha
translated: He is the color of smoke.🔽To the left is Takkirāja,

original: ser/_/g.yas pa rtshe gsum sdig 'dzub g.yon/_/rgyab tu ma ha ka li ni/_/
analyzed: ser/_/g.yas pa rtshe gsum sdig 'dzub g.yon/_/rgyab tu ma ha ka li ni/_/
translated: yellow, with a flaying knife in his right hand and a threatening forefinger in his left.🔽Behind him is Mahākālī,

original: dmar nag g.yas pa gri gug 'dzin/_/g.yon pa thod khrag zhal du rngubs/_/
analyzed: dmar nag g.yas pa gri gug 'dzin/_/g.yon pa thod khrag zhal du rngubs/_/
translated: red-black, holding a flaying knife in her right hand and drinking blood from a skull cup with her left hand.

original: rus pa'i rgyan ldan gcer bu mo/_/gar thabs keng rus gdan la bzhugs/_/
analyzed: rus pa'i rgyan ldan gcer bu mo/_/gar thabs keng rus gdan la bzhugs/_/
translated: She is adorned with bone ornaments, is naked, and sits on a skeleton seat in the dancing posture.

original: mche gtshigs spyan gsum khros pa'i zhal/_/gtsho bo dang ni dus mnyam skyed/_/
analyzed: mche gtshigs spyan gsum khros pa'i zhal/_/gtsho bo dang ni dus mnyam skyed/_/
translated: She has bared fangs, three eyes, and a wrathful face, and is born simultaneously with the blood.🔽The four karma goddesses summon all the wicked ones,

original: las kyi lha mo bzhi po ni/_/gdug pa can kun 'gugs byed cing /_/bzung🔽nas gtsho bo la stob byed/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa de rjes tsham/_/om shri ma ha ka🔽la si thi tha na ma ma hum hum phat/_rtsha ba'i sngags su bstan pa ni/_/om badzra ma ha
analyzed: las kyi lha mo bzhi po ni/_/gdug pa can kun 'gugs byed cing /_/bzung nas gtsho bo la stob byed/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa de rjes tsham/_/om shri ma ha ka la si thi tha na ma ma hum hum phat/_rtsha ba'i sngags su bstan pa ni/_/om badzra ma ha
translated: and having seized them, they offer them to the blood.🔽After that, the mantra recitation: Oṃ śrī mahākāla sthita sthāna mama hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽The mantra taught for the blood offering: Oṃ vajra mahākāla kṣa kṣa kṣetrapāla bighna vināyaka hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ.

original: ka la spyo k+she ta big nan/_bi na ya ka hu~m hum hum phat phat phat/_gtsho 'khor nye🔽byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: ka la spyo k+she ta big nan/_bi na ya ka hu~m hum hum phat phat phat/_gtsho 'khor nye byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: The mantra taught for the blood wheel: Oṃ mahākāla kṣa kṣa kṣetrapāla bighna vināyaka hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ.🔽The consecration mantra: Oṃ mahākāli jālini hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: bsnyen sngags su bstan/_/om ma ha ka li dza li ni hum hum phat/_om ma ha ka li ni
analyzed: bsnyen sngags su bstan/_/om ma ha ka li dza li ni hum hum phat/_om ma ha ka li ni
translated: The approach mantra: Oṃ mahākāli ni

original: k+she tra pa la hu~m hu~m phat/_om rad ni ta ki ra tsha hu~m hu~m phat/_om ma ha ka li ni sha
analyzed: k+she tra pa la hu~m hu~m phat/_om rad ni ta ki ra tsha hu~m hu~m phat/_om ma ha ka li ni sha
translated: Traṃ mara ya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽These are taught to be the retinue’s mantras.

original: tram ma ra ya hu~m hu~m phat/_'khor gyi sngags su bstan pa yin/_/lha la mnyes pa'i
analyzed: tram ma ra ya hu~m hu~m phat/_'khor gyi sngags su bstan pa yin/_/lha la mnyes pa'i

analyzed: gtor ma ni/_/sha lnga bdud rtshi rnam pa lnga/_/ka pa lar blug byin brlabs te/_/
translated: is the five meats and the five elixirs, which are placed in a skull cup and consecrated.🔽The retinue of the tree of sandalwood🔽arrives in front of the yogin,

original: tshan dan shing las gtsho 'khor rnams/_/byon pa rnal 'byor mdun du ni/_/sgra
analyzed: tshan dan shing las gtsho 'khor rnams/_/byon pa rnal 'byor mdun du ni/_/sgra

analyzed: dang bcas pas byon pa la/_/gsang ba'i sngags 'dis 'bul bar bya/_/om shri
translated: Offer with this secret mantra:🔽Oṃ śrī🔽vajra mahākālaya śāntiṃ

original: badzra ma ha ka la ye shas nam/_a pa ka ri nam/_ya ti pra ti dz+nya sma ra si ta d+ha i🔽dan dush+ta/_kha kha/_kha hi kha hi/_ma ra ma ra/_grih+na grisna/_ban d+ha ban d+ha/
analyzed: badzra ma ha ka la ye shas nam/_a pa ka ri nam/_ya ti pra ti dz+nya sma ra si ta d+ha i dan dush+ta/_kha kha/_kha hi kha hi/_ma ra ma ra/_grih+na grisna/_ban d+ha ban d+ha/
translated: karaṇi ya ti pratijñā sma ra si tathā🔽gata duṣṭa kha kha khāhi khāhi mara mara🔽grahaṇa grahaṇa bandha bandha🔽ha na ha na da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa

analyzed: ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsha pa tsha/_di ni me ke na ma ra ya hu~m hu~m phat phat/
translated: dina me kena mara ya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ

original: gtsho 'khor rnams kyis gsol bar bsam/_/de ltar rtags dang rab ldan pas/_/
analyzed: gtsho 'khor rnams kyis gsol bar bsam/_/de ltar rtags dang rab ldan pas/_/
translated: In this way, when you are endowed with the signs,🔽you should apply yourself to the practice of the rite,

original: bsgrub pa'i las la sbyar ba ni/_/sngags la sham bu gdags par bya/_/de nas
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i las la sbyar ba ni/_/sngags la sham bu gdags par bya/_/de nas
translated: adding the suffix to the mantra.🔽Then, you should perform the rite of killing,🔽adding ya and ya to the mantra.

original: bsad pa'i las bya ba/_/sngags la ya dang ya gdags bya/_/sbyin bsreg byas
analyzed: bsad pa'i las bya ba/_/sngags la ya dang ya gdags bya/_/sbyin bsreg byas

original: la mnan par bya/_/gtor ma steng nas mnan la bzhag_/rtags byung skyes
analyzed: la mnan par bya/_/gtor ma steng nas mnan la bzhag_/rtags byung skyes
translated: When the signs arise,🔽place the heart of Mahākāla

original: pa'i tshi ta ru/_/nag po chen po'i snying po dang /_/'khor dang bdud rtshir
analyzed: pa'i tshi ta ru/_/nag po chen po'i snying po dang /_/'khor dang bdud rtshir

original: bcas la gzhug_/dar nag gis gtums mchan khung gdags/_/skabs su
analyzed: bcas la gzhug_/dar nag gis gtums mchan khung gdags/_/skabs su
translated: From time to time,🔽take hold of it with your hand and recite all the mantras of killing.

analyzed: lag pas bzung byas la/_/bsad pa'i sngags kun bzlas par bya/_/bdag

analyzed: gis nag po chen po yi/_/sgrub thabs byin gyis rlob pa 'di/_/brtshams la

analyzed: dge ba gang yod pas/_/dpal ldan nag po'i zhal mthong shog_/byin gyis

translated: Kunga-pal-bzang-po, and he to me.
